item.name: Home
item.description: I’m not much of a traveler. I’m too anal for that level of “fly by the seat of your pants” flexibility. I like to plan every millimeter of my life, so endless days of required absence from structure is a little unnerving for me–particularly if I’m in a country that doesn’t speak the same language […]
